contents.text:
Central preferences of the application

What can you do here?

Here, you can do the central settings related to your application such as settings about your brand, choosing a theme, google analytic, update application and something like these. The list of options in this page could vary, But our prediction is that the list will be completed and optimized over time. For every option you see here, we have provided a general guide which describes the option and helps you to do your work better. Entering into each item, It is visible by clicking on the help (?) option.
